price: Na watapitishiwa vyombo vya fedha na vikombe vya vigae,
arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
footnotes: Na wakiwazungukia watumishi wao kwa bilauri za kunywea zilio fanywa kwa fedha, lakini unaona kiliomo ndani kama kwamba ni kigae,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayuṭāfu ʿalayhim biāniyatin min fiḍḍatin wa-akwābin kānat qawārīrā
